content: Make bath time go from ordinary to out of this world by sinking this galaxy bath bomb into lukewarm water. Shaped like the planet Saturn, the bath bomb features an intoxicating blackcurrant candy scent and is made using real popping candies to enhance the fizz.

Get a bird’s eye view of the world without raising too much attention by flying this R/C spy camera nano helicopter. It features a gyro stabilizer and digital proportional controls for smooth flying and can record video or shoot images at 640×480 resolution.

Increase your level of physical activity during the workday using this treadmill desk. The desk can adjust to accommodate any height while the treadmill can support up to 250 pounds and be set at speeds ranging from 0.5 to 2 mph.

Craft your own candies like a modern day Willy Wonka using this gummy bear silicone mold. The mold is made from durable BPA free & FDA approved high quality silicone and features 63 small bear shaped cavities you can fill with gummy candy or chocolate.

Power up your electronic devices even when there’s no outlet in sight using this portable solar panel. Shaped like a giant daisy flower, this waterproof panel can easily be placed on top of any roof, beach umbrella, or even the ground – to charge up to two devices at once.

Upgrade your beauty station by placing all your cosmetic products inside this makeup organizer station. Crafted from bamboo, it features a removable mirror, docking station for your tablet or smartphone, and comes coated with a stain-resistant sealant.

Open and close your garage door from anywhere using this app controlled garage door opener. It can be integrated onto your existing IP camera and provide you with updates and alerts in case your door is ever opened when you’re not home.

Put a little spring in your step by walking around in these Tiger tail sneakers. The brainchild of acclaimed shoe designer Jeremy Scott, these sneakers are extremely soft to the touch and feature a cute little tail on the back of the heel.

Ladies, get your tickets and hop aboard for a one way trip to poundtown! Whether you choose the scenic or express route, when your man uses one of these poundtown condoms you know you’re in for two solid minutes of pure bliss!

Gain a deeper appreciation for the world we live in by watching its graceful movement on this solar powered spinning globe. An intricately painted globe sits perfectly centered inside a transparent cube that accurately recreates our planet’s rotation.

Ensure your brew stays frosty as you guzzle it down by drinking it out of this insulated stainless steel beer mug. Apart from its rugged yet sleek construction, the functional design creates an air-tight barrier that insulates your drink.

Ensure your button-up stays looking clean and sharp with help from this adjustable collar stay. They’re made from stainless steel and can be positioned to eight different lengths so that they can fit all sizes and types of collared shirts.

Make your campsite a little more habitable by replacing your traditional tent with this standing room tent. When fully erect, the tent stands at six and a half feet so that you can move around and change comfortably without hurting your back.

Keep your home safe without interfering with its elegant decor by hanging this wine bottle fire extinguisher. Rather than have an ugly red eyesore hanging on your wall, this fully functional extinguisher is made to look like an expensive bottle of wine.

Bring intrigue into any plain room with some accent lighting provided from this light up 8x8x8 cube. This WiFi connected device is remarkably simple to assemble and lights up in a full range of colors making it possible to display 3D animations and images.

Make your backyard the funnest place on the block by setting up this Crayon bounce house. It’s made from a sturdy puncture-proof and fire-resistant nylon and can fit up to three kids – or one drunk adult – inside its breezy and spacious interior.

Hold yourself accountable for your unrealistic lifestyle adjustments by posing for a picture holding these New Year’s resolution mugshot signs. Each sign features a blank space in addition to a statement like “trying again” and “who am I kidding” underneath.

Take a tour of America’s most scenic locations from the comfort of home by perusing the pages of this Illustrated National Parks book. This fascinating 160 page book offers a combination of history, facts and breathtaking photographs from many national parks.

Turn your backyard into the premiere spot for fun with the Jungle Jumparoo. Designed to replace a traditional trampoline, the high impact inner tube is built for heavy use while the colorful bars provide your children with a sturdy place to grab while they jump around.

Ensure you’re getting results by tracking your workout’s effectiveness using this LED smart jump rope. This high-tech rope comes with embedded LEDs that display fitness data – such as calories burned and your jump count – in mid-air as you work out.

Enjoy the thrill of a paintball fight without needing all the expensive equipment by going into battle with these throwable paint balls. They’re easy to make, can be custom colored, and act similar to water balloons – making them ideal for playtime.

titleEN: Carps And Angsty Manatee Card Game
content: Keep the demented fun of your favorite game – Cards Against Humanity – fun and fresh with these Carps And Angsty Manatee cards set. It includes 150 original casino-quality cards that are compatible with the original Cards Against Humanity set.

Bring home some of the coolest characters to ever grace the big screen by purchasing these Pulp Fiction cursing action figures. They’re programmed with over 10 iconic phrases and feature 14 points of articulation so you recreate your favorite scenes.

The wine siphoning system allows you to access your wine without the need to ever remove the cork – so you can drink wine by the glass instead of committing to the entire bottle – extending the life of your most valued wines.

Serve up drinks in style by placing your spirits in this quaint log shaped liquor dispenser. Made from quality Ohio hardwood, they fit a wide range of bottle sizes and stand at eight inches tall making them an ideal size for any counter top.

Increase your chance of survival during a disaster with this emergency kit backpack. Made to last four people up to three days, it comes with a plethora of gear such as purified drinking water, food rations, dust masks, emergency blankets, and a first aid kit.

Video games and TV will fall by the wayside once your little monsters get a peek at this superdome trampoline and bouncer. It features a 360 degree net to prevent injuries and inflates in minutes to provide hours of enjoyment.

This refined wood litter box cabinet provides a discreet spot for your feline friend to do his business without taking away from your home’s elegant decor. The cabinet sports a nice Mahogany finish and features a side entrance for easy in and out access.

titleEN: Cool To The Touch Microwave Bowl
content: Avoid burning your fingers on the hot bowl you just heated up by using this cool to the touch microwave bowl. The ceramic bowl holding your food fits inside a larger plastic bowl equipped with handles on both sides so you can easily carry it around.

Keep your fingers from falling off on extra cold days by staying toasty with this Zippo hand warmer. Weighing only 5 ounces, it sports a sleek yet rugged design and produces a flameless and virtually odorless heat that’ll keep your hands warm.

Keep the chaos at bay by organizing all the stuff in your garage using these expandable shelves. The shelves are composed of expandable steel tubes, feature high strength anchors and screws for durability, and install in minutes.

Keep others from interrupting your precious beauty sleep by dozing off wearing this “Fuck Off” sleep mask. It provides a relaxed, comfortable fit and comes with the words “Fuck Off” beautifully embroidered across, so it’s impossible to miss.

Gain a deeper understanding of our cosmos by studying the night sky with this mini planetarium projector. It makes all the constellations clearly visible and can be set with a specific latitude, date, and time to see the night sky anywhere in the world.

Avoid getting stranded when you run into adverse weather conditions by using these tire traction blocks. They easily attach to any wheel to provide added traction and get your vehicle out of the mud, snow, or sand without needing a tow truck.

Snap into a healthy version of a Slim Jim by chomping down on one of these grass fed beef snack sticks. Made from only the freshest of natural ingredients, they’re gluten-free, paleo friendly and contain no antibiotics, hormones, or nitrates.

While a knife is indispensable in the wild, this survival bandana shines where other tools just can’t. Printed with vital survival information, this soft-brushed polyester triangular bandana can be used for tasks like providing shelter, signaling for help, and an arm sling.

Bring the fabled land of Westeros to life when you fill in this Game Of Thrones coloring book. Page after page of this book comes chock full of realistically drawn and detailed images depicting the land of dragons, white walkers, and gratuitous nudity.

Get lost in the the Big Apple without worrying about traffic, crowds, or getting mugged when you fill in this giant NYC coloring poster. This enormous poster measures 63″ x 36″ and encompasses every square inch of the city that never sleeps.

Treat your family to some fine Italian cuisine prepared from scratch using this homemade pasta maker. This time-saving appliance lets you easily prepare up to one pound of fresh pasta with the perfect consistency in just fifteen minutes!

Ensure you’re never caught unprepared in the wild by bringing along this survivalist’s multi-tool shovel. The shovel can be dissembled for easy transport and conceals an array of tools along the handle ranging from a hammer to a wire cutter.

Learn how to fold paper into ferocious looking prehistoric beasts with help from this dinosaur origami book. It comes full of challenging and fun projects that guide you step-by-step with easy to follow diagrams so you can construct an army of alpha predators.

Take your mixology skills to the next level with help from this cocktail garden kit. Using this kit, you’ll be able to grow up to six different herbs like blue boragee, lime basil, and mint, so you can top off your drinks with fresh and delicious ingredients.

Increase your tablet’s utility while on the go by bringing along this roll-up keyboard. This USB equipped QWERTY keyboard wraps up into a tight compact package and is extremely durable with a waterproof and dustproof surface.

Instantly transform any wall into a big screen TV using this mobile cordless boombox projector. It comes with a rechargeable battery that provides up to 4 hours of movie playback and streams with a variety of devices like Roku, Amazon Fire TV, and Chromecast.

Appease your inner zombie with a daily helping of braaaiiinssss by digging into a fruity jello brain. Made from durable plastic, this brain mold easily helps you create colorful and delicious fruit flavored versions of the undead’s favorite food.

Quidditch’s top seeker sweeps in for the save in the form of this Harry Potter boots bookmark. Handmade from polymer clay, the bookmark creates the illusion Harry’s plunged right into your book as his boots and broom stick out.

Say goodbye to disgusting hair clumps in your brush by swapping your old one out for this quick cleaning hair brush. The innovative design incorporates two buttons that you squeeze together in order to retract the bristles for easy cleaning.

Keep your cables from becoming a tangled mess by swapping them for this zipper charging cable. It’s made from high quality braided rope and two stainless steel heads that merge into one output, allowing you to charge two devices simultaneously.

Keep your energetic pup from running off every chance he gets by heading out with this hands free retractable dog leash.  Instead of having to constantly hold the leash, simply strap it to your wrist like a bracelet so your hands remain free at all times.

After you’ve thoroughly vetted your target, prepped the room, and have them in your sights this cereal killer spoon is all you’ll need to finish performing your morning ritual. Each vintage spoon is crafted from silverplate and is hand stamped.

Improve visibility during the dead of night like never before using this waterproof compact quad ray flashlight. Constructed from aerospace grade aluminum alloy, it features 8 distinct brightness levels ranging from 3 to 3800 lumens.

Entertain onlookers while you bust a nut like never before using this spring assisted nutcracker. After placing your nut on the small stainless steel plate, place the spring over it, lift and release it to crack the tough exterior.

Defy the laws of gravity next time you feel like grooving by blasting your tunes out of this levitating Bluetooth speaker. The innovative design wirelessly recharges as it floats and features a light up band that syncs to the music.

Concoct the perfect cocktail even if you’re nowhere near a bar by toting around one of these cocktail kits. The kit comes in a compact and fashionable tin which contains all the accouterments needed such as the recipe, bitters, sugar cubes, and a muddling spoon.

Take your taste buds for a walk on the wild side by opening up a can of rattlesnake or alligator jerky. One can come filled with good Ol’ Louisiana gator meat dipped in Cajun gravy while the other comes with filled with smoked rattlesnake. Mmmm mmm!

Work on the fundamentals in your spare time by throwing this passback practice football against a flat wall. The unique half-shape of the football makes it spiral back towards you, making it great for strengthening your throwing muscles.

Give your soiree some some eye-catching flair while maintaining an elegant decor using these light up champagne flute cups. Each 5 ounce cup comes in sets of 6 and is available in colors ranging from blue and green to orange and pink.

Get a better understanding of the principles of mechanics through the self-assembly of these modular mechanical models. The kit comes with everything necessary for you to transform single pieces of laser-cut plywood into complex moving structures.

Transform your backyard into a world class spa by installing this two person canopy barrel sauna out back. This Canadian Red cedar sauna’s design maximizes seating space and features accents like a small porch so you can relax when you step out.

Conveniently carry a multitude of useful tools without encumbering yourself using this pocket size multi-tool. The compact and slender design is small enough to fit in the palm of your hands and comes stocked with 20 useful tools ranging from a wrench to a cutting blade.

“One ring to rule them all, one ring to find them, one ring to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them.”. This officially licensed bronze precious comes coated in 24 karat gold and displays the iconic Elvish script engraved along the band.

Elevate your culinary talents to new heights with this cannabis cookbook. This groovy read features over 200 pages jam packed with delicious recipes specially developed by world renowned chefs to downplay the cannabis taste without affecting potency.

Turn your children into pint size Willy Wonkas with help from this gummy candy maker kit. This fun to use kit includes three delectable recipes and everything necessary to easily create up to 22 teddies, 9 fish, and 7 gummy snakes with a tangy fruity taste.

Keep muscles from atrophying during a long workday by outfitting your chair with this workout device. It quickly attaches to the back of your chair and allows you to perform a variety of useful resistance based upper body exercises.

Become one with nature by transforming your feet into big wooden stumps with these novelty slippers. Styled like two big old wooden stumps, they come filled with cotton and feature fluffy foam soles that makes it seem like you’re walking on clouds.

Keep your furry best friend safe during nighttime walks by taking him out in this illuminated and reflective dog vest. The waterproof design comfortably fits a variety of different sized breeds, and comes fitted with LED fiber optics so you can customize the colors.

Feel like a million bucks after waking up on these reversible performance sheets. They’re designed to wick moisture away from your skin to keep you dry and offer four-way stretch for unrestricted movement while you slumber.

Learn the basics of coding and electronics with ease using the ultimate Arduino starter kit. With over 190 electronic parts and components in addition to a 72 page manual at your disposal, you’ll be working on your own Arduino projects in no time.

Kickstart your morning breakfast by insulating your coffee while simultaneously heating up a delicious donut by using this incredible donut warming coffee mug that features a built-in plate on the top for your pastries.

titleEN: Do You Want To Play With My Balls
content: Who doesn’t love playing with balls? This sexual innuendo filled faux children’s book features detailed and vibrant illustrations alongside hilariously asinine writing such as “Your balls are so big. I can’t even fit them in my mouth!”.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Hair Gel
content: Stand apart from the crowd by accenting your party getup with some glow in the dark hair gel. Available in green, yellow, blue, and pink, this eccentric gel is easy to apply and made to glow under UV lighting so your hair really pops.

Bring some Peanuts flair to your holiday decor using this Charlie Brown Christmas tree. Designed after Charlie Brown’s iconic paltry tree, this nostalgic ornament stands 24 inches tall and comes wrapped with Linus’s blue blanket at the base.

Ensure your furry little friend gets a first-class view of their surroundings as you take them around town in this bubble backpack pet carrier. The ergonomic design leaves your hands free at all times and features a small bubble dome your pet can peek through.

Charge your smartphone or tablet like never before using this wireless charging pad. It’s compatible with a range of devices and utilizes Qi inductive charging technology which eliminates the need to attach a charging cable.

Create the ideal environment for any occasion by customizing the lighting using this multicolor light show lamp. The compact size fits easily on any nightstand and features four different music programs along with twenty distinct lighting and color combinations.

This unofficially licensed Star Wars Kama Sutra book features all of your favorite Star Wars action figures in re-imagined sexual positions such as “AT-AT Style”, “The XXX Wing”, “Revenge Of The Fist”, and everyone’s favorite “The Force Awakens.”

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Mini Golf Kit
content: Enjoy a rousing game of put-put even after the sun sets by playing with this glow in the dark mini golf kit. The railings come in four vibrant colors and can be set up in dozens of different designs to increase difficulty and keep the game fresh.

Make mealtime more appealing to the kids by animating their lunch using this penguin rice mold. The mold is made from food safe plastic and is remarkably easy to use so that both adults and kids can create tiny rice penguins.

Keep your work area clean while performing dirty jobs by using this portable roll out work surface. Apart from being waterproof, this durable composite mat is grease, gas, and oil resistant so you can work in peace without worrying about making a mess.

Outshine your entire neighborhood this holiday season by illuminating your home using these LED Christmas lights. Unlike traditional lights, they use up to 80% less energy, last longer, and are designed to shine brighter so your holiday decor stands out above the rest.

Smoke your opponents during your next gaming session by upgrading your rig with this RGB mechanical gaming keyboard. It features customizable illumination and exclusive Romer-G mechanical switches with up to 25% faster actuation.

Enjoy a coffee house quality roast anywhere you venture to by bringing along this portable espresso machine. It’s extremely well built and designed to be easily operated so that anyone can make professional quality caffeinated beverages without the fuss.

Easily stream, share, and store your data across your smartphones, tablets, and computers using this wireless flash drive. It requires no router, works on all Wi-Fi enabled devices, and provides up to four hours of streaming on a single charge.

The Book With No Pictures is a hilariously fun read that requires you to speak aloud whatever is written, no matter how silly or preposterous it sounds. It’s perfect for reading to children as they giggle hearing their parents say ridiculous things like “glibbity globbity”.

Display books and art in a way that doesn’t distract from your homes modern and minimalist style by placing them on this contemporary book case. Easy to set up, the simplistic angular design provides ample shelf space for all your stuff.

Let the power of the Dark Side flow through you every morning by chugging down a potent cup of this Star Wars themed coffee. Three distinct roasts combine to create a full-bodied blend with a sharp and smoky taste no Sith Lord can resist.

Make bath time go a little smoother in your household by bribing the kids with this money filled duck soap bar. Shaped like a little yellow rubber duckie, each pearberry scented bar comes with either a $1, $5, $10, or $50 realistic faux bill.

Get back at those annoying telemarketers for taking up your precious time by learning how to troll them using the “Messing With Telemarketers” book. This entertaining read comes packed with dozens of real life calls – each funnier than the last.

Impress friends with your impressive bar banter by turning yourself into a whiskey connoisseur with this Scratch And Sniff Whiskey book. It simplifies the complex world of whiskey into three simple categories so that anyone can become an expert in no time at all.

Nothing feels better after a long and vicious divorce than celebrating the death of your marriage with an engagement ring coffin. Finely crafted from solid wood, simply put your ring in it, bury it upside down, pee on the grave, and pop a celebratory bottle.

Add brilliant colors to your battlestation with accent lighting from this programmable light up mousepad. This high-end gaming pad comes with a sturdy rubber base, a micro-textured surface designed to provide ultimate precision, and endless custom lighting styles.

Stop struggling with heavy jugs and containers, now you can easily pour your drink with the magic tap. Designed to fit most drink containers, this innovative product allows for hands-free pouring and eliminates the need for lifting heavy and unwieldy bottles.

titleEN: Star Trek Phaser Universal TV Remote
content: Feel like a Starfleet crew member every time you change the channel by using this Star Trek phaser universal TV remote. It’s styled after the original series’ sidearm, can store up to 36 remote control commands, and makes authentic sound effects when “fired”.

Turn your humble adobe into your town’s premier white lighting watering hole using this tabletop moonshine still. The still features a durable stainless steel construction designed to last for years and is compact enough to fit discreet in your home.

Give any room in your home just the look you’re searching for using these dimmable WiFi color changing bulbs. They’re easy to set up, feature built in Wi-Fi, and allow you to change the color in a snap using your smartphone.

Treat your eyes and taste buds to a snack they won’t soon forget by snacking on this rainbow caramel popcorn. This classic delicious snack stands out above the rest not only for its sweet taste but also for its vibrant colors – such as pink, yellow, and purple.

Avoid accidents by staying visible on the road at night by placing this solar powered bike tail light on your trusty ride. This easy to install light comes with two LEDs embedded inside a waterproof casing that charges with sunlight and glows for up to eight hours.

Experience the magic of metamorphosis every time it rains by taking out this butterfly umbrella. While in its case, the umbrella is designed to look like a small caterpillar who then bursts out of its cocoon and spreads its wings to shield you from the rain.

Ensure your bundle of joy remains safe when you head out by placing them inside this military grade baby carrier. This tactical baby carrier features a MOLLE attachment system on the front and back, a sun shield, and a sturdy 100D nylon outer construction.

Submerge yourself completely into your favorite game by carrying out your marathon sessions on this video gaming chair. The ergonomic design provides full back support in addition to functional features like forward facing speakers and wireless audio transmission.
